original_title: Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein meets President Ranil
original_body_lines: Colombo, Feb 20 (PMD) - Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdollahian called on President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the Presidential Secretariat a short while ago, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
The Iranian Foreign Minister arrived in Sri Lanka yesterday (19) on an official visit.
